entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who made a comment about the Three Broomsticks being packed with people. She is defensive and says it was better than the Three Broomsticks.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who responds to Hermione's comment. He teases her and tells her she has a lot to learn.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who demands to know who overheard them. He is angry when he finds out it was Mundungus.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as the one who overheard Harry and his friends. He is also referred to as the witch under the veil.

entities.name: three broomsticks
entities.description: The Three Broomsticks is mentioned as a place that Hermione compares unfavorably to their current location.

entities.name: hog's head pub (implied by hog's head)
entities.description: Hog's Head Pub is implied by the mention of Hog's Head. Mundungus was hiding in this pub.

entities.name: dung
entities.description: Dung (Mundungus) is mentioned as someone who was hiding from Harry and his friends.

relationships.description: Harry is being followed by Mundungus, according to Sirius.
Sirius looks at Harry with pride.
